description: This blueprint represents a project in LaunchDarkly.
title: LaunchDarkly Project

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags associated with the project for organizational purposes.

description: This blueprint represents a feature flag in LaunchDarkly.
title: LaunchDarkly Feature Flag

kind.title: Flag Kind
kind.description: The type of the feature flag (e.g., boolean).

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of what the flag controls.

creationDate.title: Creation Date
creationDate.description: The date and time when the flag was created.

clientSideAvailability.title: Client-Side Availability
clientSideAvailability.description: Availability of the flag for client-side applications.

temporary.title: Temporary Flag
temporary.description: Indicates if the flag is temporary.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags associated with the feature flag.

maintainer.title: Maintainer
maintainer.description: Email address of the maintainer of the flag.

customProperties.title: Custom Properties
customProperties.description: Custom properties associated with the flag.

archived.title: Archived
archived.description: Indicates if the flag is archived.

deprecated.title: Deprecated
deprecated.description: Indicates if the flag is deprecated.

variations.title: Variations
variations.description: An array of possible variations for the flag

description: This blueprint represents an environment in LaunchDarkly
title: LaunchDarkly Environment

defaultTtl.title: Default TTL
defaultTtl.description: The default time-to-live (in minutes) for feature flag settings in this environment.

secureMode.title: Secure Mode
secureMode.description: Indicates whether Secure Mode is enabled for the environment, enhancing security by verifying user tokens.

defaultTrackEvents.title: Default Track Events
defaultTrackEvents.description: Indicates whether event tracking is enabled by default for all flags in this environment.

requireComments.title: Require Comments
requireComments.description: Indicates whether comments are required for changes made in this environment.

confirmChanges.title: Confirm Changes
confirmChanges.description: Indicates whether changes need to be confirmed before being applied in this environment.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: A list of tags associated with the environment for organizational purposes.

critical.title: Critical Environment
critical.description: Indicates whether this environment is considered critical, which may affect change management and notifications.

description: This blueprint represents a feature flag in LaunchDarkly Environment.
title: Feature Flag In Environment
